Package popt4jlib.MSSC

Package implements algorithms for Minimum-Sum-of-Square(-Errors)-Clustering, a well-defined optimization problem.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClustererInitIntf
    Interface for K-Means initial centers determination.
    ClustererIntf
    The interface every class implementing algorithms for MSSC clustering should obey.
    ClustererTerminationIntf
    Interface defines the methods that must be supported by any class that will specify termination criteria for a clusterer algorithm.
    EvaluatorIntf
    interface for MSSC evaluations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClustererTerminationNoCenterMove
    specifies that a clustering process must stop when two successive calls of isDone() the centers found by the associated clusterer have not moved at all.
    ClustererTerminationNoMove
    specifies that the clustering process may end when in two successive calls of the isDone() method, no vector has changed its assignment to another cluster.
    ClustererTerminationNumIters
    specifies that the clustering process will stop after a fixed number of calls to the isDone() method.
    DetAnnealClusterer
    the class implements the Deterministic Annealing algorithm for MSSC by Rose.
    GMeansMTClusterer
    class implements multi-threaded version of the (hard) K-Means algorithm, in a thread-safe manner.
    KMeansCC
    implements the KMeans|| method for seeds initialization for the K-Means algorithm.
    KMeansNormSqrEvaluator
    implements the classical MSSC criterion for a given clustering BUT with normalized attribute values (dimensions) in [0,1], as the default in WEKA SimpleKMeansClusterer.
    KMeansPP
    implements the KMeans++ method for seeds initialization for the K-Means algorithm.
    KMeansSqrEvaluator
    implements the classical MSSC criterion for a given clustering.
    NeuralGasMTClusterer
    parallel implementation of Neural Gas by Martinetz & Schulten for MSSC.
    SumOfVarianceEvaluator
    implements the Sum-Of-Intracluster-Variances criterion for a given clustering.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ClustererException
    Defines a checked exception that may be thrown from clustering algorithms.

Package popt4jlib.MSSC Description

Package implements algorithms for Minimum-Sum-of-Square(-Errors)-Clustering, a well-defined optimization problem.

Package Specification

The ClustererIntf interface declares the methods that every MSSC clusterer should implement. The class GMeansMTClusterer is a thread-safe multi-threaded algorithm implementing the (hard-version) K-Means algorithm for MSSC clustering, without the possibility of multiple restarts. The K-Means++ method for seed initialization is also implemented.
